# Quic Docs

> Documentation for Quic Docs.

*Topics available: 3*

- [QUIC configuration options in .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/networking/quic/quic-options.md): Learn details about the configuration for QUIC protocol in .NET.
- [QUIC support in .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/networking/quic/quic-overview.md): Learn about the support for QUIC protocol in .NET.
- [Troubleshoot QUIC issues in .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/networking/quic/quic-troubleshooting.md): Learn how to diagnose and fix the most common QUIC issues in .NET.
